Name: Leopard-class DropShip
Details: First flow in 2537, the Leopard-class DropShip is one of the most common space ships found throughout human space, because of its low cost and easy maintenance, and excelling at small-unit operations. With a mass of 1,900 tons, a Leopard can carry and deploy four BattleMechs and two AeroSpace Fighters, although many have refitted their fighter bays to carry more 'Mechs or cargo.
